snippet: Brian J. Dunn’s departure came as the board looked into his “personal conduct,” the electronics retailer said.
abstract: Best Buy chief executive Brian J Dunn resigns unexpectedly amid an investigation by the board into what it called his 'personal conduct'; resignation comes one week after Dunn outlined an ambitious restructuring plan to revive the struggling electronics retailer.
lead_paragraph: Brian J. Dunn’s departure came as the board looked into his “personal conduct,” the electronics retailer said.

headline.seo: Best Buy’s Chief Resigns Amid Inquiry
headline.main: Best Buy Chief Executive Resigns Amid Inquiry
headline.print_headline: Best Buy’s Chief Steps Down Amid Inquiry of Personal Conduct
